html: (1 Nephi 20:2)."The Lord of Hosts is his name." Both the Book of Mormon and the Old Testament use this title over fifty times each. It refers to Jesus Christ or Jehovah and is used on occasions when a stern warning or reprimand is in order. It designates the Lord's role as the One who is "mighty in battle." (Psalm 24:8-10; DCE, 329.)
